author: Simon Difford
description: A Blood & Sand made with tequila. A classic Scotch whisky based Blood & Sand is made with equal parts of all four ingredients, but the cherry brandy, vermouth and orange seem to overwhelm tequila when used in place of Scotch, hence the much higher proportion of spirit in this riff.
name: Gringo's Blood & Sand

recipeInstructions.text: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and fine strain into chilled glass
